title: A Historical Figure in a Modern Context
description: Listen to Drew Lanham describe Audubon and his “readymade appearance,” during the artist’s lifetime and ever since. Lanham discusses what inspired him to write “tweets” in the gallery.

title: !Contexto moderno para una figura histórica
description: !Escuche a Drew Lanham describir a Audubon y su "apariencia prefabricada", durante la vida del artista y desde entonces. Lanham habla sobre lo que lo inspiró a escribir "tweets" en la galería.
